title: Shrinkify Entwicklungsprojekt
description: Web-based file compression tool designed for seamless CMS integration. Shrinkify enables structured uploads, automated optimization and role-based workflows for content managers and asset owners, focusing on usability, security and scalable processing of large media files.

detail.overviewHeadline: A modular web application for automated file compression in CMS-driven environments.
detail.overviewMeta: Shrinkify streamlines large media handling through intuitive upload flows, structured processing and clear role separation between asset owners and content managers.
detail.processHeadline: The system architecture balances usability, security and technical constraints.
detail.processMeta: Frontend, backend and conversion logic were structured around defined ADRs to ensure maintainability, scalability and future integration into existing CMS workflows.

detail.overviewMeta: Varia enables the creation of reusable, CI-compliant product modules that enhance digital storytelling and conversion on marketing websites.

title: Solara Booking
description: Booking flow redesign focused on speed, trust cues, and cleaner conversion paths.

detail.overviewHeadline: A conversion-oriented booking flow balancing trust, speed, and clear next-step guidance.
detail.overviewMeta: The interface simplifies high-friction form steps with progressive disclosure and clear state feedback.
detail.processHeadline: Iterated with usability checks and implementation constraints to keep patterns reusable.
detail.processMeta: Built in React with a modular component structure designed for future expansion and A/B testing.

title: Atlas Dashboard
description: Analytics interface designed for high-density information without visual overload.

detail.overviewHeadline: A structured dashboard system turning dense metrics into clear, scannable decisions.
detail.overviewMeta: Layouts prioritize hierarchy, comparability, and low-cognitive-load scanning across viewports.
detail.processHeadline: Built with reusable cards, chart wrappers, and strict spacing/typography tokens.
detail.processMeta: Pattern-level decisions reduced edge-case styling while keeping data modules easy to maintain.

title: Kinetic Commerce
description: Commerce experience with refined motion and product storytelling across the funnel.

detail.overviewHeadline: A commerce experience where motion supports clarity instead of distracting from purchase intent.
detail.overviewMeta: Micro-transitions were tuned to guide decisions around product variants and checkout confidence.
detail.processHeadline: Designed and shipped with performance budgets and progressive enhancement in mind.
detail.processMeta: Animations degrade gracefully while preserving hierarchy and perceived responsiveness.

title: Northstar Platform
description: Enterprise product shell emphasizing consistency, clarity, and accessibility.

detail.overviewHeadline: A scalable product shell for enterprise teams operating across complex workflows.
detail.overviewMeta: Navigation and layout patterns were standardized to reduce onboarding friction.
detail.processHeadline: Accessibility and keyboard flow were treated as first-class implementation constraints.
detail.processMeta: Reusable primitives lowered UI drift across teams and improved long-term maintainability.
